document.masterDocTitle: New distribution records of Asilidae (Insecta: Diptera) for Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New distribution records of Asilidae (Insecta: Diptera) for Mexico

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Entomología y Acarología, Instituto de Fitosanidad, Colegio de Campus Montecillo, Carretera México-Texcoco km 36.5, 56230 Montecillo, Estado de México, Mexico
Entomología y Acarología, Instituto de Fitosanidad, Colegio de Campus Montecillo, Carretera México-Texcoco km 36.5, 56230 Montecillo, Estado de México, Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph:
Genus distribution in Mexico .
Chihuahua , Colima , Guanajuato , Guerrero , Hidalgo , Jalisco , Mexico City , Morelos , Nayarit , Nuevo León , Oaxaca , Puebla , Sinaloa , Sonora , Tabasco , Tamaulipas , Veracruz , and Yucatán ( Papavero 2009 ).

Species distribution in Mexico .
Chihuahua , Morelos , Nayarit , Puebla , Sinaloa , and Veracruz ( Papavero 2009 ).

New records. Coahuila
(Matamoros),
Durango
(Cañón Fernández),
Jalisco
(San Buenaventura; Los Ángeles Locos; Talpa, 12 km S from El Tuito and 22 km E from El Tuito),
Oaxaca
(Dominguillo 19 km SSE from Cuicatlán) and
San Luis Potosí
(Real de Catorce and Temazunchale).
